attributes.action: Urge the London 2012 Committee to reconsider and redesign their "new" logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new Olympics logo is ill thought out, ill prepared and owes more to the TV show Tiswas than any original thought.

The design is basic, jagged on the eye and says nothing about the strength of London nor of the Olympic Games.  

The cost of the new logo is unjustified given the result, which has already faced overwhelming public disapproval.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
